name: write cad
desc: The write_CAD module provides EVS with vector output of graphical results in industry standard AutoCAD DWG or DXF format.

properties.name: Append To File
properties.desc: When the Append To File toggle is on, the existing file contents will be preserved.

properties.name: Output File Version
properties.desc: The Output File Version specifies which version of CAD to write in. Not used for DGN files.

properties.name: Color Tolerance
properties.desc: The Color Tolerance determines how precisely the colors must be represented in the output file. Setting to 0% will cause full colors to be added to the cad palette. Setting to 100% will minimize additional colors, and attempt to match standard palette.

properties.name: Layer Naming
properties.desc: The Layer Naming specifies how to name the layers or levels created by EVS.

properties.name: Include Cellset Index
properties.desc: The Include Cellset Index toggle will cause layer names to include the cellset index.
